definition: surname Gui

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor
see 豎筆|竖笔[shu4 bi3]
radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 2)
radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 4)/see 撇[pie3]
pig snout (Kangxi radical 58)
to return to/to retreat/regression (statistics)
to return sth/to revert
to belong to/to be affiliated to/to fall under the jurisdiction of/a place where one feels that one belongs/one's final destination (where one need look no further)
to bring to justice/to file away (a document)
to sum up/to summarize/to conclude from facts/induction (method of deduction in logic)
to sum up/to conclude/in a nutshell/the end (of a story)
to return to one's unit/to go back to one's station in life
to give credit/to give sb his due/attribution
place to return to/home/final destination/ending

homeless

sentences.english: The weather became so bad that they had to turn back.
sentences.chinese: 天气变得很坏，他们只好原路而归了。

sentences.english: And all that dwelt at Lydda and Saron saw him, and turned to the Lord.
sentences.chinese: 凡住吕大和沙仑的人都看见了他，就归服主。

sentences.english: In the year of the jubilee all shall return to their possessions.
sentences.chinese: 在这喜年内，人各归其祖业。

sentences.english: Party B shall still have the ownership of the equipment until Party B is paid in full.
sentences.chinese: 甲方未付清全款前，设备的所有权仍归乙方所有。

sentences.english: "Lucrece, " quoth he, "this night I must enjoy.
sentences.chinese: 佳丽，今夜，你须归我享用。

sentences.english: Weston now demanded all profits from these sales go entirely to the investors.
sentences.chinese: 威斯顿如今却要求所有销售的利润均归投资者。

sentences.english: Luring [A7] students back from foreign campuses constitutes China's new class struggle[A8] .
sentences.chinese: 因此，吸引海外学生归囯成为了中囯新的阶级斗争。

sentences.english: I belive that the people of XIANGXIN will provide honest service to surprise you .
sentences.chinese: 我们祥鑫人将会以真诚的服务令您们满意而归。

sentences.english: One day God will right every wrong.
sentences.chinese: 到那日，上帝必使每件事都归正。

sentences.english: In China, Overseas Chinese Farm is the most significant organization that collectively settled the returned Vietnamese Chinese refugees.
sentences.chinese: 华侨农场是中国安顿越南归难侨最集中的社区。

sentences.english: Take the horse and the cart, you devil, only don't take my life.
sentences.chinese: 马和车都归你，你个魔鬼，只要留下我的命。

sentences.english: Glory to God in the highest heaven, and on earth peace among those whom he favors!
sentences.chinese: 在至高之处荣耀归神，在地上平安归他所喜悦的人。

sentences.english: 32But I, when I am lifted up from the earth, will draw all men to myself.
sentences.chinese: 我若从地上被举起来，就要吸引万人来归我。

sentences.english: All the days of his separation he is holy unto the LORD.
sentences.chinese: 在他离俗的日子，他都是归耶和华为圣的。

sentences.english: If only Belshazzar had learned to give glory to the true and living God!
sentences.chinese: 如果伯沙撒知道将荣耀归给那又真又活得神就好了。

sentences.english: Be at rest once more, O my soul, for the Lord has been good to you.
sentences.chinese: 我的心哪，你要仍归安乐，因为耶和华用厚恩待你。
